HediffDef.label: Hexa Eye
HediffDef.description: A highly sophisticated eye implant that splits the neural nerves into a set of three pairs, with each set isolating and analyzing a seperate set of data, thus ensuring that not even the smallest detail is lost.

ThingDef.label: Hexa Eye
ThingDef.description: A highly sophisticated eye implant that splits the neural nerves into a set of three pairs, with each set isolating and analyzing a seperate set of data, thus ensuring that not even the smallest detail is lost.

HediffDef.label: Optic Tracer
HediffDef.description: A miniature data processing center embedded into the eye socket, that filters important data and processes vital information before it is sent to the brain. This results in an improvement in reaction and decision making speed for trained users. Due to limited space, only one Greyscythe module will fit within the eye socket. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Optic Tracer implant
ThingDef.description: A miniature data processing center embedded into the eye socket, that filters important data and processes vital information before it is sent to the brain. This results in an improvement in reaction and decision making speed for trained users. Due to limited space, only one Greyscythe module will fit within the eye socket. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Predictor
HediffDef.description: A miniature data processing center embedded into the eye socket, that collates active data and makes rapid predictions of future data, sending this info in easily processed packets into the users brain. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Predictor implant
ThingDef.description: A miniature data processing center embedded into the eye socket, that collates active data and makes rapid predictions of future data, sending this info in easily processed packets into the users brain. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Toxfilter Nose
HediffDef.description: A bionic nose replacement which filters out all waste and toxins from the air, greatly increasing their resistance to all airborne toxins and pathogens.

ThingDef.label: Toxfilter Nose
ThingDef.description: A bionic nose replacement which filters out all waste and toxins from the air, greatly increasing their resistance to all airborne toxins and pathogens.

HediffDef.label: Ripper Jaw
HediffDef.description: An advanced bionic jaw replacement that features a full set of self-sharpening, retractable, self-sharpening razor teeth, designed to tear through armor, flesh and bone, while also increasing the intimidation factor of whoever they are attached to.

ThingDef.label: Ripper Jaw
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic jaw replacement that features a full set of self-sharpening, retractable, self-sharpening razor teeth, designed to tear through armor, flesh and bone, while also increasing the intimidation factor of whoever they are attached to.

HediffDef.label: Nutrient Grinder
HediffDef.description: A powerful all-purpose grinder, planted within the back of the throat. Any material passed through this horrifying machine is effectively annihilated, allowing the user to extract all viable nutrients from it with near-perfect effeciency. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Nutrient Grinder implant
ThingDef.description: A powerful all-purpose grinder, planted within the back of the throat. Any material passed through this horrifying machine is effectively annihilated, allowing the user to extract all viable nutrients from it with near-perfect effeciency. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Attenuation Ear
HediffDef.description: An advanced bionic ear that also acts as a sonar, radar, early warning system and sound isolator. Someone with this ear will be able to detect danger before even seeing it, and know where its coming from and how fast.

ThingDef.label: Attenuation Ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced bionic ear that also acts as a sonar, radar, early warning system and sound isolator. Someone with this ear will be able to detect danger before even seeing it, and know where its coming from and how fast.

HediffDef.label: Rangefinder
HediffDef.description: An advanced automatic data processing microcomputer attached to the ear that takes the collected sonic data and attaches 98% accurate range estimates to each of them, allowing them to be turned into highly reliable rangefinding data. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Rangefinder implant
ThingDef.description: An advanced automatic data processing microcomputer attached to the ear that takes the collected sonic data and attaches 98% accurate range estimates to each of them, allowing them to be turned into highly reliable rangefinding data. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Hurricane Defense System
HediffDef.description: A highly advanced integrated network of smart-mine launchers that can be manually triggered by the user to launch and detonate a fine cloud of dust-like microepxlosives, stunning and damaging all around them, while simultaneously disuading approach by lesser foes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

AbilityDef.label: Hurricane Defense System
AbilityDef.description: Trigger the Hurricane defense system, launching and detonating a dense cloud of micorexplosives implanted withing the torso's dermal layer, causing massive damage to all targets around the user.

ThingDef.label: Hurricane Defense System
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced integrated network of smart-mine launchers that can be manually triggered by the user to launch and detonate a fine cloud of dust-like microepxlosives, stunning and damaging all around them, while simultaneously disuading approach by lesser foes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Overshield System
HediffDef.description: A sophisticated manufacturing system that deploys a dense swarm of shield-generating mechanites to protect a localized area. The generated shield protects a small localised area, designed to give the user time to deal with the enemies around themselves without being interference from more distant foes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

AbilityDef.label: Overshield System
AbilityDef.description: Deploy a dense swarm of shield-generating mechanites to protect a small localised area for a short duration.

ThingDef.label: Overshield System
ThingDef.description: A sophisticated manufacturing system that deploys a dense swarm of shield-generating mechanites to protect a localized area. The generated shield protects a small localised area, designed to give the user time to deal with the enemies around themselves without being interference from more distant foes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Calf Thrusters
HediffDef.description: Powerful compact thrusters that extend from the back of the calf, providing microthrusts to boost the user's speed and ability to self-correct. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the leg it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Calf Thrusters
ThingDef.description: Powerful compact thrusters that extend from the back of the calf, providing microthrusts to boost the user's speed and ability to self-correct. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the leg it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Shoulder Thrusters
HediffDef.description: Powerful compact thrusters that fold into the shoulders, providing microthrusts to boost the user's striking speed and ability to self-correct. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Shoulder Thrusters
ThingDef.description: Powerful compact thrusters that fold into the shoulders, providing microthrusts to boost the user's striking speed and ability to self-correct. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Recoil Dampeners
HediffDef.description: Gyro-stabilized angle-correcting micropneumatics, with delicate sensors that detect kickback and work to neutralize it, reducing recoil and loss of balance, decreasing the time between consecutive attacks. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Recoil Dampeners
ThingDef.description: Gyro-stabilized angle-correcting micropneumatics, with delicate sensors that detect kickback and work to neutralize it, reducing recoil and loss of balance, decreasing the time between consecutive attacks. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Flameblock
HediffDef.description: A dermal replacement that insulates the user and makes them completely immune to being set on fire. These implants are highly valued by firefighters and pyromaniacs alike. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Flameblock
ThingDef.description: A dermal replacement that insulates the user and makes them completely immune to being set on fire. These implants are highly valued by firefighters and pyromaniacs alike. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Exoshield
HediffDef.description: A powerful hi-tech internal shield generator, which controls a highly sophisticated network of self-hardening and regenerating defensive nanites. These nanites produce a nanometer-thin non-neutonic shield around all the pawn's organs, cushioning them from damage. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Exoshield
ThingDef.description: A powerful hi-tech internal shield generator, which controls a highly sophisticated network of self-hardening and regenerating defensive nanites. These nanites produce a nanometer-thin non-neutonic shield around all the pawn's organs, cushioning them from damage. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove whatever it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Joint Stabilizer
HediffDef.description: Powerful gyroscope-stabilized pneumatic micro-rotors attached to reinforced bionic joints, made to replace standard joints. These allow the user to maintain perfect balance almost effortlessly, with the affected limb performing microcorrections to ensure maintained stability. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the limb it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Joint Stabilizer
ThingDef.description: Powerful gyroscope-stabilized pneumatic micro-rotors attached to reinforced bionic joints, made to replace standard joints. These allow the user to maintain perfect balance almost effortlessly, with the affected limb performing microcorrections to ensure maintained stability. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the limb it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Reaction Accelerator
HediffDef.description: A mechanite control network embedded into the spine that accelerates the transmission of neural signals, increasing reaction speed significantly. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Reaction Accelerator
ThingDef.description: A mechanite control network embedded into the spine that accelerates the transmission of neural signals, increasing reaction speed significantly. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Neural Booster
HediffDef.description: A microscopic supercomputer that is integrated into the user's brain via a sophisticated web network of mechanite tendrils, boosting the thinking and processing speed without overriding any independent thought processes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Neural Booster
ThingDef.description: A microscopic supercomputer that is integrated into the user's brain via a sophisticated web network of mechanite tendrils, boosting the thinking and processing speed without overriding any independent thought processes. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the limb it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Personal Autodoc
HediffDef.description: An advanced autodoc, compressed into a tiny computer about the size of a fingernail, embedded into a slot above the liver to interface with the body's natural immune and healing systems, accelerating it significantly at the cost of the body's nutrition. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Personal Autodoc implant
ThingDef.description: An advanced autodoc, compressed into a tiny computer about the size of a fingernail, embedded into a slot above the liver to interface with the body's natural immune and healing systems, accelerating it significantly at the cost of the body's nutrition.. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Food Ultraprocessor
HediffDef.description: A powerful toxicity detector and atomizer that ensures that only non-toxic nutrients are passed into the user's digestive system. This makes the user immune to food poisoning, and allows them to safely consume almost anything. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Food Ultraprocessor implant
ThingDef.description: A powerful toxicity detector and atomizer that ensures that only non-toxic nutrients are passed into the user's digestive system. This makes the user immune to food poisoning, and allows them to safely consume almost anything. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Gyro-Stabilizer
HediffDef.description: A highly advanced pelvis replacement that is reinforced with plasteel shielding and anchored to a advanced self-regulating central-axis gyroscopic modulator, making the user highly stable and capable of making extreme movements without being thrown off-balance.

ThingDef.label: Gyro-Stabilizer
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced pelvis replacement that is reinforced with plasteel shielding and anchored to a advanced self-regulating central-axis gyroscopic modulator, making the user highly stable and capable of making extreme movements without being thrown off-balance.

HediffDef.label: Oxygen Compressor
HediffDef.description: A highly advanced lung replacement that extracts oxygen from air with nearly 100% effeciency, storing excess into compression tanks to be distributed upon need.

ThingDef.label: Oxygen Compressor
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced lung replacement that extracts oxygen from air with nearly 100% effeciency, storing excess into compression tanks to be distributed upon need.

HediffDef.label: Superior Trachea
HediffDef.description: An armored bionic trachea that protect the user's neck while also acting as an upgrade to the nerve connection bundles between the spine and the brain. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

ThingDef.label: Superior Trachea implant
ThingDef.description: An armored bionic trachea that protect the user's neck while also acting as an upgrade to the nerve connection bundles between the spine and the brain. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the part it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: Reinforced Central Shield
HediffDef.description: A hi-tech shield heavily armored compact shield generator that replcaes the sternum, reinforcing the ribcage and protecting the soft tissue within, particularly from bullets and sharp attacks.

ThingDef.label: Reinforced Central Shield
ThingDef.description: A hi-tech shield heavily armored compact shield generator that replcaes the sternum, reinforcing the ribcage and protecting the soft tissue within. It also monitors biometric data and redistributes resources in case any damage is detected.

HediffDef.label: Organ Exo-Shell
HediffDef.description: A heavily reinforced yet highly flexible ribcage replacement that protects the internal organs from blasts and blunt force trauma, while also injecting powerful repair nanites and painkillers when damage is detected.

ThingDef.label: Organ Exo-Shell
ThingDef.description: A heavily reinforced yet highly flexible ribcage replacement that protects the internal organs from blasts and blunt force trauma, while also injecting powerful repair nanites and painkillers when damage is detected.

HediffDef.label: Hyper Refinery
HediffDef.description: An extremely powerful nutrient refinery that replaces the stomach and its functionality, breaking down all received food into super effecient processed fuels that are then sent via mechanite superhighway to the areas they are most needed. Ironically, this makes the user hungrier faster, due to the food being used almost too effeciently.

ThingDef.label: Hyper Refinery
ThingDef.description: An extremely powerful nutrient refinery that replaces the stomach and its functionality, breaking down all received food into super effecient processed fuels that are then sent via mechanite superhighway to the areas they are most needed. Ironically, this makes the user hungrier faster, due to the food being used almost too effeciently.

HediffDef.label: shoulder-mounted assault turret
HediffDef.description: A tiny shoulder mounted automatic gun. It can swivel freely and select its own targets, acting like a support gunner in direct assistance to the person it is mounted on. Its advanced gyroscope and smart-targeting AI stop it from shooting the person its mounted on. This variant is designed with burst fire capabilities, increasing its overall damage output. Each pawn can only have 1 shoulder gun mounter per shoulder. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

li.label: Shouldergun
li.description: A tiny automatic gun made to be mounted on a hip.

ThingDef.label: shoulder-mounted assault turret
ThingDef.description: A tiny automatic gun designed to be mounted onto a bionic notch on the shoulder. It can swivel freely and select its own targets, acting like a support gunner in direct assistance to the person it is mounted on. Its advanced gyroscope and smart-targeting AI stop it from shooting the person its mounted on. This variant is designed with burst fire capabilities, increasing its overall damage output. Each pawn can only have 1 shoulder gun mounter per shoulder. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

HediffDef.label: hip-mounted assault turret
HediffDef.description: A tiny hip mounted assault gun. It can swivel freely and select its own targets, acting like a support gunner in direct assistance to the person it is mounted on. Its advanced gyroscope and smart-targeting AI stop it from shooting the person its mounted on. This variant is designed with burst fire capabilities, increasing its overall damage output. Each pawn can only have 1 hip gun mounted per leg. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!

li.label: Hipgun
li.description: A tiny automatic gun made to be mounted on a hip.

ThingDef.label: hip-mounted assault turret
ThingDef.description: A tiny automatic gun designed to be mounted onto a bionic notch on the hip. It can swivel freely and select its own targets, acting like a support gunner in direct assistance to the person it is mounted on. Its advanced gyroscope and smart-targeting AI stop it from shooting the person its mounted on. This variant is designed with burst fire capabilities, increasing its overall damage output. Each pawn can only have 1 hip gun mounter per leg. \n\nPlayer's note: remember to remove this implant when planning to upgrade/remove the arm it's attached to, otherwise it will be destroyed!
